verses.verse: He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> on your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and I will speak with <S%H1696>you.<s%>
The <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into me when he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H5975>me,<s%> and set me on my <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> him who spoke to <S%H1696>me.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> I <S%H7971>send<s%> you to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to a <S%H1471>nation<s%> of <S%H4775>rebels<s%> who have <S%H4775>rebelled<s%> against <S%H1>me.<s%> They and their fathers have <S%H6586>transgressed<s%> against me even to this <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> are <S%H7186>impudent<s%> and <S%H2389>stiff-hearted:<s%> I am <S%H7971>sending<s%> you to <S%H559>them;<s%> and you shall tell <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H8085>They,<s%> whether they will hear, or whether they will <S%H2308>forbear,<s%> (for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>), yet shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that there has been a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> among <S%H8432>them.<s%>

<S%H1121>You,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3372>don't<s%> be afraid of <S%H3372>them,<s%> neither be afraid of their <S%H1697>words,<s%> though <S%H5621>briers<s%> and <S%H5544>thorns<s%> are with <S%H3427>you,<s%> and you do dwell among <S%H6137>scorpions:<s%> <S%H3372>don't<s%> be afraid of their <S%H1697>words,<s%> nor be <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at their <S%H6440>looks,<s%> though they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
You shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%> to <S%H8085>them,<s%> whether they will hear, or whether they will <S%H2308>forbear;<s%> for they are most <S%H4805>rebellious.<s%>

But <S%H1121>you,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> what I <S%H1696>tell<s%> <S%H1961>you;<s%> don't be <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> like that <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> <S%H6475>open<s%> your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> that which I give <S%H5414>you.<s%>
When I <S%H7200>looked,<s%> <S%H3027>behold,<s%> a hand was <S%H7971>put<s%> forth to <S%H4039>me;<s%> and, behold, a scroll of a book was <S%H5612>therein;<s%>

He <S%H6566>spread<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3789>me:<s%> and it was written <S%H6440>within<s%> and <S%H268>without;<s%> and there were <S%H3789>written<s%> therein <S%H7015>lamentations,<s%> and <S%H1899>mourning,<s%> and <S%H1958>woe.<s%>
